mapper.select: select * from pro_image where product_id = ${product_id}
select * from product where product_id = ${product_id}

select * from sell_history where product_id=${product_id} and (size_type, sell_price) in (select size_type, min(sell_price) as sell_price from sell_history where product_id=${product_id} and status1='입찰중' group by size_type)
select * from buy_history where product_id=${product_id} and status1='입찰중'
select * from sell_history where sell_id=#{sell}
select * from (select * from sell_history order by sell_price) where product_id=${product_id} and size_type=${size} and status1='입찰중' and rownum <= 1
select * from (select * from buy_history order by buy_price desc) where product_id=${product_id} and size_type=${size} and status1='입찰중' and rownum <= 1
select * from address where user_id=#{user_id} and flag=1
select * from address where user_id=#{user_id} order by flag desc
select * from address where address_id=${addr_id}

select aa.rn, aa.product_id, aa.brand, aa.collection, aa.category, aa.eng_name, aa.kor_name, aa.gender, aa.release_date, aa.release_price, aa.model_number, aa.color, aa.post_status, aa.regdate, count(lp.product_id) as cnt from ( select rownum rn, tt.* from ( select * from product where release_date is not null order by release_date desc ) tt ) aa left join like_pro lp on lp.product_id like aa.product_id where aa.rn>=${startNum} and aa.rn<=${endNum} group by aa.rn, aa.product_id, aa.brand, aa.collection, aa.category, aa.eng_name, aa.kor_name, aa.gender, aa.release_date, aa.release_price, aa.model_number, aa.color, aa.post_status, aa.regdate order by aa.product_id

select * from pro_image where product_id in (select product_id from ( select ROWNUM rn, tt.* from ( select * from product where release_date is not null order by release_date desc)tt) where rn>=${startNum} and rn<=${endNum} ) order by product_id
select * from market_price where product_id=${product_id} order by signing_date
select min(sell_price) from sell_history where product_id=${product_id} and status1='입찰중'
select max(buy_price) from buy_history where product_id=${product_id} and status1='입찰중'
select * from (select * from market_price where product_id=${product_id} order by signing_date desc) where rownum <= 1
select count(*) from like_pro where product_id = ${product_id}
mapper.insert: insert into buy_history(buy_id, product_id, address_id, user_id, buy_price, period, size_type, cum_uid, status1, buy_date) values(buy_history_seq.nextval, #{product_id}, #{address_id}, #{user_id}, #{buy_price}, #{period}, #{size_type}, #{cum_uid}, #{status1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from buy_history where buy_id=(select (LAST_NUMBER-1) from USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='BUY_HISTORY_SEQ')
select * from (select * from market_price where product_id=${product_id} order by signing_date desc) where rownum <= 5
select * from buy_history where buy_id=${bid}
